scripts.dev3: npm run tauri dev -- -- -- open window/bar
scripts.dev: npm run -s monitors | awk '{print "cargo run open window/bar --args " $0}' | sh
scripts.dev2: npm run -s monitors | xargs -I {} cargo run open window/bar --args {}
scripts.dev:WORKING: cargo run open window/bar --args MONITOR_NAME=Monitor\ #41038 MONITOR_X=0 MONITOR_Y=0 MONITOR_WIDTH=3024 MONITOR_HEIGHT=1964
scripts.dev8: npm run -s monitors | sed 's/\\ /\\\ /g' | xargs -I {} npm run tauri dev -- -- -- open window/bar --args {}
scripts.dev7: npm run -s monitors | sed 's/"/\"/g' | xargs -I {} npm run tauri dev -- -- -- open window/bar --args {}
scripts.dev6: npm run -s monitors | awk '{print "npm run tauri dev -- -- -- open window/bar --args " $0}' | sh
